treveraTerms.reConfirmationMessage.title: Re Confirmation Message
treveraTerms.reConfirmationMessage.default:
By opting out of the Provider Rewards Program (“Program”), you will no longer enjoy any of the benefits that our tier members receive under the Program. You will also no longer earn tier benefits including but not limited to receiving product discounts, earning rewards points, and/or redeeming rewards points, and you will forfeit any unexpired rewards points (if applicable to your account). Deletion of rewards points is final and cannot be reversed. Also, please keep in mind that if you decide to opt out of the Program, you will be purchasing our consumables at its standard, MSRP retail price.

 If you wish to proceed forward, please select 'Yes, I'm sure I don't want to join the loyalty program & webstore'. If you have further questions, please contact Customer Care.
